Description: Has a built-in tracker and announcement service
Uses Mono Project or Mono Project for cross-platform support (.NET)

IPv6: Yes (IPv4 and IPv6 have separate binaries and processes that do not share any information between them. If a client communicates to the tracker over IPv6, it will only receive IPv6 addresses in the response.)
Description: Uses libowfat,Embedded hardware performs well even on Embedded hardware. Only requirement is a Embedded hardware compliant Embedded hardware. Supports only a compact peer list.
Extremely lightweight and efficient BitTorrent (protocol) tracker. Supports BitTorrent (protocol), and BitTorrent (protocol) for storage.
Does not have a list of hosted torrents.
Lightweight. Supports DHT, PEX, announcements via UDP. Does not have a web interface or list of hosted torrents; it is not designed for secure or large-scale application.
Vuze (formerly Azureus) has a built in tracker.
Uses MySQL for data storage, lightweight tracker
A lightweight tracker that does not require any external database support.
